subject: Nutrition
title: The Anabolic Window Myth
description: A 60-second lesson on The Anabolic Window Myth.

hook.text: Bodybuilders chug shakes within 30 minutes of training. The 'anabolic window' is mostly fiction.

buildup.text: The theory claims muscles absorb protein better in a narrow window right after exercise ends.

discovery.text: Research shows the real window is 4 to 6 hours wide. Timing within that range barely affects muscle growth.

twist.text: Total daily protein matters far more than timing. A meal at hour 3 works as well as a shake at minute 5.

climax.text: The urgency around post-workout shakes was manufactured by supplement marketing, not exercise science.

punchline.text: The anabolic window is real but much wider than advertised.

quiz.question: How wide is the actual 'anabolic window'?
